name: Someone Better - a Light Novel
description:
SOMEONE BETTER is a light novel created for to promote a story made by Czarina/Jude. It is about a guy who was depressed over a girl and found someone new.

It's short and an introduction to many more novels to come. Tell me what you think and if I should continue making more in the future, or if I start making interactive visual novels.

Background: Deviantart - afiniwind - bunnyvoid - Yan Shu - Aa - Rebloggy

Music: Soundcloud - DJ Rolfsky, Youtube - Dalo Vian - Lucas King
